name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 8: Xtreme Legends Complete Edition
description:
Game should be installed into "C:\Program Files\Dynasty Warriors 8 Xtreme Legends".

Before playing this game you'll probably want to configure it. To do it, right click on the game icon in the Lustris window and use "Run EXE inside wine prefix".
Then navigate to "drive_c/Program Files/Dynasty Warriors 8 Xtreme Legends/" and select Config.exe.
content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Dynasty Warriors 8 Xtreme Legends/Launch.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: devenum
    description: Installing devenum
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: wmp9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing WMP9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing game
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  xboxdrv: --type xbox360
